body_content.explanation: the birth of Jesus Christ, celebrated by Christians at Christmas:
examples: Christmas is the season when Christians around the world recount the story of the Nativity.

body_content.explanation: a model or picture of the Nativity:
examples: The nativity consisted of elaborate hand-carved figures.
Nativity sets sell well in the run-up to Christmas.

body_content.explanation: a play that tells the story of Jesus Christ's birth, usually performed by children at Christmas:
examples: She played the role of Mary in the school nativity.
